author: Eric Raby
job: Personal Growth Coach & Head of Sales

comments.text: Thanks to what he learned in team sports like basketball, such as discipline, stress management, and how to set goals, Ã‰ric compassionately supports young people by truly listening to them. He uses a method that places the person at the center (called PCP), allowing everyone to express themselves freely and progress at their own pace.

He also works with athletes or teams to help them perform while taking care of their personal balance. Whether for a teen, an athlete, or a group, Ã‰ric offers tailored support to help everyone grow, progress, and feel good about what they do.

comments.author: Ã‰ric Raby â€“ Coach for Teens and Families
comments.text: Ã‰ric RABY is a former high-level athlete who played basketball and decided to put his experience at the service of young people and their families. He helps teens regain confidence, better understand themselves, and find motivation, especially during times of doubt or questioning.

aboutme_section.title: Who am I ?
aboutme_section.subtitle: Ã‰ric Raby: coach and mentor dedicated to adolescents and their families.
aboutme_section.text: I inspire everyone to reach their goals while cultivating well-being and personal harmony.
aboutme_section.bio:
A former high-level athlete who played basketball, <name>Ã‰ric Raby</name> has acquired key skills such as <skills>discipline, motivation, rigor, performance management, and leadership</skills>. These qualities, forged on the basketball courts, have shaped his approach to supporting children and parents in achieving their projects (academic, sports, professional).

Specializing in impact and kindness, <name>Ã‰ric</name> has focused on supporting adolescents, a period often marked by <issues>doubts, questions, and a lack of motivation</issues>. Through the <method>PCP method</method> (Person-Centered Approach), he creates a safe space where each young person can express their needs and work on their goals. His role is to help adolescents reconnect with their potential, overcome obstacles, and strengthen their self-confidence. Through this personalized approach, he guides them to become aware of their <strengths>strengths and aspirations</strengths>, in order to find a clear path towards the future. This awareness includes parents in the success of their children.

A telling example: <teen>Ines</teen>, a teenager struggling academically, was able to rediscover her passions and positively redirect her goals. She was supported to overcome her blocks, regain motivation, and embark on a more fulfilling path.

In addition to his expertise in personal development, <name>Ã‰ric</name> holds a diploma in <cert>sports team management</cert> registered with the <org>DRAJES</org> (Regional Directorate of Youth, Sports, and Social Cohesion). This certification issued by the <org>CPNEF</org> (National Joint Employment Training Commission) allows him to work with athletes and teams to achieve their goals while preserving their well-being and balance.

about_action1_section.title: My Intervention in Schools
about_action1_section.subtitle: **Fostering the personal and social development of students**

text.title: Are you experiencing situations like these? Let's talk about it.
text.text: Everyone goes through moments when everything seems more complicated. Whether you're a teen, parent, or young adult, there are times when you may feel stuck, misunderstood, or overwhelmed. Here are some situations I often encounter and on which I can help you, step by step.

text.title: Difficulties in communication
text.text: Do you struggle to say what you think or feel? Do you feel afraid to speak, assert yourself, or simply express yourself? These blocks can hinder your development, whether at school, at home, or in your projects. Together, we work to help you find your voice and assert your ideas calmly and confidently.

text.title: Social isolation
text.text: Do you feel alone or struggle to make connections? It's not always easy to make friends or build healthy relationships. I help you gradually open up to others, better understand human relationships, and create genuine and lasting bonds.

text.title: Anxiety in social situations
text.text: Speaking in public or simply meeting new people can stress or even frighten you. This discomfort is not inevitable. Together, we learn to tame this fear, build your confidence, and feel more at ease in interactions.

text.title: Difficulty setting boundaries
text.text: Do you often say 'yes' when you want to say 'no'? Do you struggle to assert yourself, set clear boundaries, or express your needs? We work together so you can respect yourself, be respected, and feel freer in your choices.

text.title: Managing your emotions
text.text: Do you sometimes react too strongly or not know whatâ€™s going on inside you? Understanding your emotions and knowing how to manage them is a real strength. I support you in learning to recognize what you feel, express it without exploding, and better manage your reactions.

about_action2_section.title: My Support for Adults
about_action2_section.subtitle: My support for adults focuses on listening and personalized assistance. I help everyone overcome their challenges and achieve their goals. Together, we build a path towards fulfillment and success.

text.title: Do you feel that something is holding you back?
text.text: There comes a time when we realize that despite all our efforts... something is stuck. Thoughts that go in circles, projects that we postpone, a feeling of not moving forward. If you recognize yourself in any of these points, know that you are not alone and that it can change.

text.title: You constantly postpone what matters
text.text: Do you have projects, desires, but always put them off? Procrastination is not laziness; itâ€™s often a mix of fear, pressure, and confusion. We learn to set priorities, break tasks down, and gradually take back control of your life.

text.title: Itâ€™s time to take back control of your journey
text.text: You donâ€™t have to wait for a 'burnout' or a crisis to ask for help. Taking care of yourself is already a victory. And thatâ€™s where change begins.

text.title: Constant self-criticism
text.text: This little voice in your head that wonâ€™t let go, reminding you of your mistakes and making you doubt yourselfâ€¦ It can become a real hindrance in everyday life. Together, we work to silence it (or at least calm it), so you can move forward with more kindness towards yourself.

text.title: The fear of failing
text.text: Do you struggle to take the first step? To dare to start a project, make a decision, or simply try? The fear of failure is often linked to the fear of others' opinionsâ€¦ or your own. I help you transform this fear into a driving force to move forward, step by step.

text.title: Do you feel that something is holding you back?
text.text: There comes a time when we realize that despite all our efforts... something is stuck. Thoughts that go in circles, projects that we postpone, a feeling of not moving forward. If you recognize yourself in any of these points, know that you are not alone and that it can change.

about_guidance_section.title: My Guidance in Sports Associations
about_guidance_section.subtitle: Guiding young people towards sporting excellence... and personal growth
about_guidance_section.subtitle_1: Performance is not built solely on the field. Behind every athlete, there is a mindset to strengthen, motivation to maintain, and confidence to develop.Thatâ€™s why I support young athletes aged 13 to 19 in clubs and sports associations, with an approach centered on mental strength and personal balance.

1.title: Mental Strength, the Key to Performance

text.3: âœ”ï¸ Learn to manage pressure, emotions, and the stress of competition

text.1: â€œPreparing the body is good. Preparing the mind is crucial.â€
text.2: Whether itâ€™s about returning after an injury, overcoming a dip in motivation, or preparing for an important event, I offer concrete tools tailored to the age and reality of each young athlete.

3.title: In Collaboration with Clubs and Coaches

text.1: My support is in collaboration with coaches and supervisors: I do not replace, I complement. Together, we build a framework that allows the young person to progress as an athlete... and as a person.

about_method_section.title: My Well-Being Method...
about_method_section.subtitle: Mental & Physical Balance: A Holistic Approach for Sustainable Performance
about_method_section.subtitle_1: Behind every performance, there is a mindsetâ€¦ and a well-prepared body. The pressure to succeed, the stress of competitions, injuries, and mental fatigueâ€¦ all of this can hinder a young athlete, an active adult, or anyone seeking well-being. When the mind falters, the body follows. And the reverse is equally true.

text.1: I offer a holistic method that combines mental support and nutritional guidance to help you:

paragraphs: Souvent, nous considÃ©rons lâ€™inquiÃ©tude comme un problÃ¨me Ã  Ã©liminer. Mais elle est dâ€™abord <g>un mÃ©canisme naturel de protection</g>. Câ€™est une alerte du systÃ¨me nerveux, une tentative (parfois maladroite) de nous prÃ©parer au danger ou Ã  lâ€™incertitude.
